High Quality Home Emergency Cover & Repair Services

Nobody likes surprise repair bills. Our home emergency and landlord coverage will protect you from these unexpected expenses for as little as £15 per month.

VIEW PLANS

We are here to help

Emergency Plumber

Fast, reliable, and professional emergency plumbing service available 24/7 to fix any plumbing problems quickly within Bradford, Leeds and all of West Yorkshire.

Boiler Repairs

Expert local boiler repair service with Gas Safe engineers to diagnose and fix any issues with your heating system.

Servicing Plans

Affordable boiler service plans for preventative maintenance, ensuring efficient operation, and preventing unexpected breakdowns or repairs.

DISCOVER OUR PLANS

Why choose MS Gas Services?

Great Value

95% of repairs fixed on the first visit so no repeat call out costs.

Local & In-House

We don’t use subcontractors and are local to the Bradford, Leeds and West Yorkshire area.

Same Day

We will respond to your emergency situation with one of our local expert engineers to your location on the same day.

24/7

Simple booking process with our UK based 24/7 contact centre.

Areas we Cover

Although we’re expanding our service areas, we currently concentrate on the Leeds and Bradford region to provide local services to the community.

Although we’re expanding our service area, we currently concentrate on the West Yorkshire region to provide the local community with an outstanding and the best service in Bradford, Leeds, Halifax, Huddersfield, Wakefield, Dewsbury, Batley and surrounding areas.

Areas we Cover

Although we’re expanding our service areas, we currently concentrate on the Leeds and Bradford region to provide local services to the community.

Although we’re expanding our service area, we currently concentrate on the West Yorkshire region to provide the local community with an outstanding and the best service in Bradford, Leeds, Halifax, Huddersfield, Wakefield, Dewsbury, Batley and surrounding areas.

Ready to protect your home?

Home Cover

Our home emergency cover is a plan that provides protection for unexpected emergencies that can occur in your home, such as a burst pipe, boiler breakdown, or electrical failure. This type of policy can provide you with peace of mind, knowing that you have access to emergency assistance and support 24/7, 365 days a year.

GET A QUOTE
LEARN MORE
Boiler Cover

Our boiler cover plan provides protection for your boiler and heating system. With a boiler cover policy, you can have peace of mind knowing that your boiler is protected against unexpected breakdowns, repairs, and maintenance costs.

GET A QUOTE
LEARN MORE
Landlord boiler cover

Having landlord boiler cover can save you time and money, as you won’t have to worry about unexpected repair costs or arranging boiler servicing. It can also help you meet your legal obligations as a landlord to ensure that your rental property meets certain safety standards.

GET A QUOTE
LEARN MORE

All Plans Include

Unlimited Repairs

Unlimited callouts for the entire length of the contract. Book a repair 24 hours a day 365 days a year through our customer portal. Parts and labour included on all covers.

Guaranteed Price for 3 Years

Regardless of the number of home repairs we conduct, we guarantee a fixed monthly price for up to three years.

Boiler Service

Boiler service is part of all the plans for homeowners (worth £84.00). Gas safety inspection & boiler service is part of all the plans for landlords (worth £124.00)

24 hour helpline

Our emergency help desk is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and so are our in-house engineers.

DISCOVER OUR PLANS

Simple and easy to switch your
home plan to us today.

100s are switching every week. Only MS Gas Engineering Services will guarantee
not to increase your price for up to 5 years.

DISCOVER OUR PLANS

What our customers are saying...

“I can’t thank Ms Gas Engineering Services! Our boiler broke down during a cold snap, and they sent an engineer the same day. He was friendly, efficient, and got it working in no time. The fixed monthly price makes budgeting easy. Highly recommended!”

Jack D., CEO

Incredibly fast and reliable service—arrived the same day I reported the leak. Provided a brand new tap included in the price and even gave a discount. Excellent workmanship, very polite and professional. I’m extremely happy and would highly recommend them!

Nina A., Huddersfield

“The team at Ms Gas Engineering Services! is brilliant. I’ve used them for emergency plumbing and regular boiler servicing, and they never disappoint. Fast response, great communication, and no hidden fees. I feel secure knowing help is just a call away 24/7.”

Liam W., Bradford

“From the first call, Ms Gas Engineering Services impressed me. Friendly customer service, fast same-day callout, and a boiler repair done right the first time. I love that they don’t use subcontractors—it really shows in the quality of their work and best services.”

Emma T., Leeds

About us Ms Gas Servises

MS Gas Engineering Services is a trusted team of in-house, Gas Safe registered engineers providing expert plumbing, heating, and boiler solutions across West Yorkshire. We offer 24/7 emergency response, same-day callouts, and transparent pricing. Our goal is to deliver reliable, high-quality service with a focus on customer care and safety.

Our Vision

Our vision is to become the UK’s most trusted provider of reliable, affordable home and boiler cover services.

Our Mission

Our mission is to deliver fast, reliable, and affordable heating and plumbing services with exceptional customer care across the UK.

More About Us

Trusted by industry innovators worldwide
